name: js-website-crawler
description: Website crawler written in JavaScript built with Node.js.

scripts.build: set NODE_ENV=production && rimraf ./dist && babel src/crawler.js --out-file dist/crawler.js
scripts.test: set NODE_ENV=test && echo "Error: no test specified" && exit 1

author: Alex Devero <deveroalex@gmail.com> (http://github.com/alexdevero)
